title: HYPNOTIC TRANSFER, FASCINATION & ECSTASY PART 2 / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Marco Paret and his students are in the park, where they are closer to nature, to exercise and experience powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques. Dr. Paret helps his student to enter in a really deep hypnotic state of ecstasy thru fascination and hypnotic trasfer. Universite Europeenne is the most advanced school of non-verbal hypnosis where you can learn all of these powerful techniques.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
